name: I Wanna Play the Simple Medley 3
name_original: I Wanna Play the Simple Medley 3
description:
This is an I wanna game

by Medley as subject

This game is less difficult than other Medley games

So those who are not so good can play this game

The game has a total of four Stages

There are also five hidden items

There are also two bonus levels

I hope you like it :)
